name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: She learned a tragic lesson that day: even the purest can be corrupted when the heart's emotions are twisted.

name: Aerial Volley
oracle_text: Aerial Volley deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Drakes can swerve to avoid a single arrow, but they can't dodge the whole sky.

name: Akroan Jailer
oracle_text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: He ensures escape attempts are just that—attempts.

name: Akroan Sergeant
oracle_text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Alchemist's Vial
oracle_text:
When Alchemist's Vial enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Alchemist's Vial: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.
flavor_text: A weapon best suited for those with good aim and steady hands.

name: Ampryn Tactician
oracle_text: When Ampryn Tactician enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It's all a game. You shouldn't get too attached to the pieces."

name: Artificer's Epiphany
oracle_text: Draw two cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.
flavor_text: The artificers of Kaladesh strive ceaselessly for perfection, progress, and the ultimate expression of elegance.

name: Aspiring Aeronaut
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aspiring Aeronaut enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Aven Battle Priest
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Aven Battle Priest enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: When the shadow of the aven falls across the battlefield, hope rises in the hearts of the soldiers.

name: Bellows Lizard
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Bellows Lizard gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: As the price of wood and coal rose, smiths found creative ways to keep their forges burning.

name: Boggart Brute
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

name: Bonded Construct
oracle_text: Bonded Construct can't attack alone.
flavor_text: Loyal to a fault, it heeds its master's every command.

name: Bone to Ash
oracle_text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Calculated Dismissal
oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, scry 2. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Catacomb Slug
flavor_text:
"The entire murder scene was covered in dripping, oozing slime. No need for a soothsayer to solve that one."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

name: Caustic Caterpillar
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Caustic Caterpillar: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The rare and beautiful butterflies inspire the design of our thopters. The larvae, however, are a different story entirely."
—Kiran Nalaar, Ghirapur inventor

name: Celestial Flare
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"You were defeated the moment you declared your aggression."
—Gideon Jura

name: Chandra's Fury
oracle_text: Chandra's Fury deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
flavor_text: "They started it."

name: Charging Griffin
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Charging Griffin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Four claws, two wings, one beak, no fear.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

name: Cleric of the Forward Order
oracle_text: When Cleric of the Forward Order enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control named Cleric of the Forward Order.
flavor_text: War after war, a healer's enemy is always the same—death itself.

name: Cobblebrute
flavor_text: Ravnica's most ancient streets take on a life of their own. A few have decided to move to nicer neighborhoods.

name: Dark Dabbling
oracle_text:
Regenerate target creature. Draw a card. (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, also regenerate each other creature you control.

name: Deadbridge Shaman
oracle_text: When Deadbridge Shaman dies, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Ending her life won't end the infestation.

name: Deep-Sea Terror
oracle_text: Deep-Sea Terror can't attack unless there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: After stripping the sunken ships, it rises to the surface for another helping.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text: Nothing of nature nor of mortals can stand forever.

name: Disperse
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: It's pointless to hold on when you have nothing to hold on with.

name: Divine Verdict
oracle_text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: "Guilty."

name: Dragon Fodder
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
flavor_text: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

name: Dreadwaters
oracle_text: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: Stray into the Morkrut and it may rise to claim you.

name: Eagle of the Watch
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text:
"Even from miles away, I could see our eagles circling. That's when I knew we were needed at home."
—Kanlos, Akroan captain

name: Elvish Visionary
oracle_text: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor_text: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

name: Enlightened Ascetic
oracle_text: When Enlightened Ascetic enters the battlefield, you may destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "I do not reject the gods. I reject their authority, their pettiness, and their arrogance."

name: Enshrouding Mist
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it this turn. If it's renowned, untap it.
flavor_text: True faith is letting the blade fall without parry. True cunning is using that moment to strike a deadly blow.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

name: Eyeblight Assassin
oracle_text: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

name: Faerie Miscreant
oracle_text:
Flying
When Faerie Miscreant enters the battlefield, if you control another creature named Faerie Miscreant, draw a card.
flavor_text: One faerie distracts the judge while a second steals the law.

name: Fetid Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}: Fetid Imp gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Fiery Hellhound
oracle_text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."
—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

name: Fiery Impulse
oracle_text:
Fiery Impulse deals 2 damage to target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Fiery Impulse deals 3 damage instead.
flavor_text: "Well, this got out of hand."

name: Firefiend Elemental
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Flesh to Dust
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"Another day. Another avenging angel. Another clump of feathers to toss in the trash."
—Liliana Vess

name: Ghirapur Gearcrafter
oracle_text: When Ghirapur Gearcrafter enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.

name: Grasp of the Hieromancer
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."
flavor_text:
"There is power in abandon, but far more in control."
—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

name: Guardian Automaton
oracle_text: When Guardian Automaton dies, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: The wealthy in the city of Ghirapur outfit their lives with grand machines, entrusting even their children to filigree and gears.

name: Guardians of Meletis
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The histories speak of two feuding rulers whose deaths were celebrated and whose monuments symbolized the end of their wars. In truth they were peaceful lovers, their story lost to the ages.

name: Healing Hands
oracle_text:
Target player gains 4 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The ethereal touch brings relief. The physical touch brings peace.

name: Heavy Infantry
oracle_text: When Heavy Infantry enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: Doors, walls, skulls . . . it matters not. All barriers will be broken.

name: Hitchclaw Recluse
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Not all spiders need webs to catch their prey.

name: Infectious Bloodlust
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1, has haste, and attacks each combat if able.
When enchanted creature dies, you may search your library for a card named Infectious Bloodlust, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Infernal Scarring
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has "When this creature dies, draw a card."
flavor_text: One who is marked by a demon in life is sure to be remembered as one in death.

name: Knight of the Pilgrim's Road
oracle_text: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor_text: "To be a knight, Gideon, is to be the shield for the meek against the cruel."

name: Kytheon's Tactics
oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures also gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
flavor_text: "Seal the gate. This is our fight now."

name: Leaf Gilder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

name: Lightning Javelin
oracle_text: Lightning Javelin deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: The harpies descended without mercy upon Akros, only to find their attack put them within range of the javelineers.

name: Llanowar Empath
oracle_text: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Macabre Waltz
oracle_text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"All dead move to the hollow rhythm of necromancy."
—Savra

name: Mage-Ring Bully
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Mage-Ring Bully attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: "Don't be rude, Beleren. We just want to enjoy the view with you."

name: Mantle of Webs
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Why does everything the Golgari touch end up sticky?"
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Maritime Guard
flavor_text: To stand as a guardian of the sea, one must possess the resolve of a mounting wave.

name: Might of the Masses
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature you control.
flavor_text: The Joraga elves never need ask a troll to leave their territory. They merely grant it their combined strength, and it can't resist embarking on a merry rampage.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising."
—Ashiok

name: Nantuko Husk
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Nantuko Husk gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The soul sheds light, and death is its shadow. When the light dims, life and death embrace."
—Nantuko teaching

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Nightsnare
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, that player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Ravnica would be safer if mere coin was all the Dimir could steal.

name: Nissa's Pilgrimage
oracle_text:
Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, search your library for up to three basic Forest cards instead of two.

name: Nivix Barrier
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Nivix Barrier enters the battlefield, target attacking creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

name: Orchard Spirit
oracle_text: Orchard Spirit can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
flavor_text:
"Pick not the rotten fruit, but neither touch the best. Leave those as an offering for our unseen guests."
—Radwick, farmer of Gatstaf

name: Pharika's Disciple
oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Prickleboar
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Prickleboar gets +2/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Canyons in the Phoberos badlands are essentially gates to the Underworld."
—Mirinthes, Akroan captain

name: Rabid Bloodsucker
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Rabid Bloodsucker enters the battlefield, each player loses 2 life.
flavor_text: She haunts the streets, wings spread wide, with carrion on her breath and blood in her eyes.

name: Read the Bones
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Reave Soul
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."
—Liliana Vess

name: Reclaim
oracle_text: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

name: Returned Centaur
oracle_text: When Returned Centaur enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.
flavor_text: Driven away by his living kin, he wanders mourning through the wilderness, seeking the dead city of Asphodel.

name: Rhox Maulers
oracle_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Ringwarden Owl
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: The owls learn of mana from the mages who know it best.

name: Scrapskin Drake
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"The cathars killed my skaabs down below. Let's see how high their swords can reach."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Screeching Skaab
oracle_text: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, mill two cards.
flavor_text: Its screeching is the sound of you losing your mind.

name: Send to Sleep
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

name: Separatist Voidmage
oracle_text: When Separatist Voidmage enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"As long as each side thinks it can win, the balance holds, and the mage-rings stand."
—Alhammarret

name: Shambling Ghoul
oracle_text: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.

name: Smash to Smithereens
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
flavor_text: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

name: Stalwart Aven
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Stratus Walk
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Stratus Walk enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Enchanted creature can block only creatures with flying.

name: Subterranean Scout
oracle_text: When Subterranean Scout enters the battlefield, target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: When things get ugly above ground, goblins resort to alternate routes of passage.

name: Suppression Bonds
oracle_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
flavor_text:
"A master of hieromancy can see the advantage in any scenario."
—Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

name: Thornbow Archer
oracle_text: Whenever Thornbow Archer attacks, each opponent who doesn't control an Elf loses 1 life.
flavor_text: "I will not rest until the stench of eyeblights is eradicated from these woods."

name: Timberpack Wolf
oracle_text: Timberpack Wolf gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control named Timberpack Wolf.
flavor_text: Their strength is no mere numbers game. An intangible force augments the wolves when they run together.

name: Titanic Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

name: Titan's Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Topan Freeblade
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
flavor_text: "My scars are my sigils. I will wear them with pride long after you're gone."

name: Touch of Moonglove
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. Whenever a creature dealt damage by that creature dies this turn, its controller loses 2 life. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

name: Undead Servant
oracle_text: When Undead Servant enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Get up. You're not finished yet."
—Liliana Vess

name: Unholy Hunger
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature.
Spell mastery — If there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Liliana viewed the attention of the angels as a testament to her power. Even so, they were an annoyance.

name: Vastwood Gorger
flavor_text:
"A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."
—Mulak Ffar, *Vastwood Biodiversity*

name: Veteran's Sidearm
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "I've broken three swords, eighteen lances, and countless shields, but this little blade has survived every battle, just like I have."

name: Vine Snare
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with power 4 or less.
flavor_text: Nissa found that the vines of the marsh could ensnare just as well as forest vines could—maybe even better.

name: Volcanic Rambler
oracle_text: {2}{R}: Volcanic Rambler deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: It moves through lava with the force of an erupting volcano.

name: Watercourser
oracle_text: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow."
—Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

name: Weave Fate
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Destiny is a flickering path among tangled possibilities.

name: Weight of the Underworld
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-2.
flavor_text: Proud Alkmenos, who would not bow to Erebos in death, is now bowed by his own hubris for all eternity.

name: Wild Instincts
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Nissa had only the space of a heartbeat to react, her instincts steering her blade.

name: Yeva's Forcemage
oracle_text: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

name: Yoked Ox
flavor_text:
It was in fields of grain, not fields of battle, that the Champion learned to bear the yoke of duty to the gods. She worked the land long before she was called on to defend it.
—*The Theriad*
